message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great fit for your needs. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9000.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8500. I'm willing to pay that amount for the product.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your concerns, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $8800.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8200. I'm willing to pay that amount for the product.
I understand you're trying to get a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to compromise again. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $8600.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm getting close to my target price. I'm willing to pay $8000 for the product.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $8100.
I'm trying to get as close to my target price as possible, but I'm not willing to go much higher than $7900. I'm willing to pay that amount for the product.
I understand you're trying to get close to your target price, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $7950. This is my final offer.
I've made my last offer, Alice. I'm willing to pay $7800 for the product. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider buying from John for $10000.
